>
[Tinkering Fingers](/Feats.aspx?ID=5656) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ratfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=769" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 30 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You're trained in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=37). If you are trained in Crafting from another source (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You can [Repair](/Actions.aspx?ID=2384) an item without using a [repair toolkit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2747) without taking the –2 circumstance penalty, improvising tools from whatever you have at hand. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Crafting checks to Repair an item when you have a repair toolkit.
name: Tinkering Fingers
